mapper.insert: insert into weiit_weixin_public_menu (menu_name, action_type, target_type, target_content, link_url, parent_id, title, create_time, update_time, authorizer_id) values (#{menu_name}, #{action_type}, #{target_type}, #{target_content}, #{link_url}, #{parent_id}, #{title}, now(), now(), #{authorizer_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weiit_weixin_public_menu WHERE authorizer_id = #{authorizer_id} and parent_id = -1
mapper.insert: insert into weiit_blog (title, content, create_time, update_time, shop_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, now(), now(), #{shop_id})
